actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution condemning the assassination of Fernando Buesa and Jorge Diez Elorza, Spanish nationals, by the Basque separatist group, ETA, and expressing the sense of the Congress that violent actions by ETA cease.

summary.text: Declares that Congress: (1) condemns and denounces those responsible for the bombing that killed Fernando Buesa and Jorge Diez Elorza; (2) shares the determination of the Spanish people that the perpetrators will be brought swiftly to justice so that Spain may demonstrate its opposition to acts of terror; (3) calls again on the Basque separatist group ETA and those responsible for this act to renounce violence and terrorism; and (4) continues to cherish the strong friendship between Spain and the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution condemning the assassination of Fernando Buesa and Jorge Diez Elorza, Spanish nationals, by the Basque separatist group, ETA, and expressing the sense of the Congress that violent actions by ETA cease.
